Position Description
CGI is looking for a Machine Learning Architect (ML) who can join our emerging technology group in the digital insight practice. The ML Architect will be responsible for designing, architecting & developing data ingestion and data transformation framework for modern data science solutions

The Machine Learning Architect will also be providing statistical trend analysis on large structured and unstructured data sets and analysis of advanced algorithms including artificial intelligence concepts. The candidate will be responsible for adapting and modifying machine-learning algorithms to address user requirements and case studies, establishing new proof of concepts for our clients. The candidate should have experience with architecture recommendations for large enterprise clients in financial industries.

Data Ingestion of structured and unstructured data using Kafka, CDC, Spark, or similar technologies.

Advanced degree in a quantitative discipline, e.g., Computer Science or Linguistics Analytics
5+ years industry experience in applied NLP or combination of NLP and Machine Learning
Experience: Natural Language Processing (NLP), Optical Character Recognition (OCR), Selenium, Beautiful Soup
Fluent with scripting in Python
o OCR libraries such as Tesseract, PyOCR, OpenCV
o NLP libraries such as NLTK, spaCy, or Stanford NLP
o ML libraries such as Scikit-learn, Spark, Tensorflow, Keras, or PyTorch
oDeployment technologies such as docker, kubernetes, REST API and/or Flask
Comfort with rapid prototyping and disciplined software development processes
Practical software engineering experience in collaborative project settings
Experience with SQL and NoSQL databases
